root.name: The Flintstones
root.description: Critical ReceptionWhen the Genesis version was released in 1998 Electronic Gaming Monthly's Mike Weigand gave the game a score of 5 out of 10. He wrote, "... Fred's moves like running, ducking, and powering up his mighty club... look downright ridiculous. The levels are nice and long, but there needs to be more of them. In addition, the prehistoric end bosses are very weak".
